intro: The following army list allows you to field an Eldar army from the Biel-Tan Craftworld.
strategy: Biel-Tan Eldar armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: Aspect Warrior formations, Titans and the Avatar have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.

formations.name: 1 Avatar
formations.units: One Avatar with a Court of the Young King character

formations.name: 0-1 Wraithgate
formations.units: Replace one objective marker in the Eldar player's half of the table with a Wraithgate, this counts as an objective marker and a Webway Portal which may not be attacked or damaged in any way.

sections.name: Biel-Tan Warhosts
sections.description: Up to one Guardian Warhost may be taken for each Aspect or Mounted Aspect Warhost

formations.name: Mounted Aspect Warrior Warhost
formations.units: Four Wave Serpents and eight Aspect Warrior units chosen from the following: Dark Reapers, Dire Avengers, Fire Dragons, Howling Banshees, Striking Scorpions or Swooping Hawks. The formation may not mix aspects.
extraUnits: Replace any number of Wave Serpents with two Falcons each: 50 points each
Replace one Wave Serpent with two Firestorms: 50 points

formations.name: Aspect Warrior Warhost
formations.units: Eight Aspect Warrior units chosen from the following: Dark Reapers, Dire Avengers, Fire Dragons, Howling Banshees, Shining Spears, Striking Scorpions, Swooping Hawks or Warp Spiders. The formation may not mix aspects.

formations.name: Guardian Warhost
formations.units: One Farseer unit and seven Guardians
extraUnits: Replace up to three Eldar Guardians with Eldar Heavy Weapon Platforms: Free
Replace up to three Eldar Guardians with Support Weapons Platforms (all armed with the same weapon): 25 points each
Add up to three Eldar Wraithlords: 50 points each
Add four Wave Serpents: 150 points (may only be taken if the entire formation can fit inside)

sections.name: Biel-Tan Troupes
sections.description: Up to three Biel-Tan Troupes may be taken for each Biel-Tan Warhost

formations.name: War Walker Troupe
extraUnits: Add up to two War Walkers: 25 points each

formations.name: Wind Rider Troupe
extraUnits: Replace any number of Eldar Jetbikes with Eldar Vypers: Free

formations.name: Swords of Vaul
extraUnits: Replace up to two Falcons with Firestorms: Free

formations.name: Engines of Vaul
formations.units: One Engine of Vaul chosen from the following: Cobra, Scorpion, Storm Serpent
extraUnits: Add up to two additional Engine of Vaul for 200 points each chosen from the following: Cobra, Scorpion, Storm Serpent

sections.name: Biel-Tan Aircraft, Spacecraft and Titans
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations.

upgrades.title: Biel-Tan Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: 0-1 Autarch
items.description: Add one Eldar Autarch character to a unit with an Eldar Exarch character

items.name: Exarchs
items.description: Add up to two Eldar Exarchs
